battleshipprojekt3

Class BattleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • battleshipprojekt3.BattleController

  • public class BattleController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class describes the main controller in the MVC theory.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BattleController.BoardListener
      When user clicks on BattleView1.viewBoard the BattleController.BoardListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use modelInterface2 to change and update the model and use the updated information from the model to update the view with theView.
      (package private) class  BattleController.ColorButtonListener
      when user clicks on BattleView1.colorB the BattleController.ResetButtonListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use theView to update the view.
      (package private) class  BattleController.ResetButtonListener
      when user clicks on the BattleView1.resetB the BattleController.ResetButtonListener.actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent) method will use modelInterface2 to change and update the model and use the updated information from the model to update the view with theView.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int COLONS

      in the constructor BattleController ROWS will be initiated to the value of the the constant ROWS in BattleModelInterface2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BattleController(BattleView1 theView, BattleModelInterface2 modelInterface2)
      the constructor adds listeners to the view components with help of the theView field by using the classes: BoardListener, ResetButtonListener and ColorButtonListener.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BattleController

        public BattleController(BattleView1 theView,
                        BattleModelInterface2 modelInterface2)
        the constructor adds listeners to the view components with help of the theView field by using the classes: BoardListener, ResetButtonListener and ColorButtonListener. Also with help of the modelInterface2 field it initiates ROWS and COLONS.
        Parameters:
        theView - object (reference) to BattleView1
        modelInterface2 - object (reference) to BattleModel which can only reach the methods and fields declared in BattleModelInterface2.
